title: Pentagon to Brief on Missile Defense Review on Thursday, Jan. 17, 2019
content: Jan. Press AdvisoryRelease No: PA-003-19                                Under Secretary of Defense for Policy John C. Rood, Under Secretary of Defense for Research and Engineering Michael D. Griffin and Missile Defense Agency Director U.S. Air Force Lt. Gen. Samuel A. Greaves will conduct an off-camera press conference on the 2019 Missile Defense Review in the Pentagon Press Briefing Room (2E973) at 12:30 p.m. EST on Thursday, Jan. .Both U.S. and foreign journalists without a Pentagon building pass must be pre-registered in the Pentagon Visitor Management System to attend this press conference; plan on being escorted from the River Entrance Pedestrian Bridge or the Pentagon Metro Entrance Facility only. Please arrive no later than 45 minutes before the briefing; have proof of affiliation and photo identification. Please call 703-697-5131 for any questions and escort into the building.
